name: New Lands Paradise Island Collector's Edition
name_original: New Lands Paradise Island Collector's Edition
description:
Try being the owner of a whole island amid the south sea in new time management game. Gather tropical fruit and make refreshing ice cream. Develop your own resort. As you go farther into the new lands, your tasks will become ever more varied and difficult. Train your skills in the new time manager genre game!




- locations with tropical views
- fun storyline
- varied tasks
- unbelievable achievements

- interesting gameplay
- beautiful graphics
- relaxing music
- heavenly mood
